name: Artist Color Pencil Extreme Waterproof Lip Liner
about: What it is:An intensely pigmented, waterproof lip liner that glides on lips for all-day, no-budge color..Benefits:Long-wearing.Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This waterproof, transfer-proof pencil is ideal for definition that won't feather or fade. The ultra-creamy texture glides with ease and wears comfortably all day, has a velvet-matte finish, and can be worn alone or with your favorite lipstick or gloss.
ingredients: Isododecane, Synthetic Wax, Mica, Polybutene, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Sucrose Tetrastearate Triacetate, Isoamyl Laurate, Silica, Hydrogenated Jojoba Oil, Cetearyl Behenate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Barium Sulfate, [+/- Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides), Ci.15850 (Red 7)]...Product ingredient listings are updated periodically. Before using a MAKE UP FOR EVER product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging to ensure that the ingredients.are suitable for your personal use.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Trace the Cupidu2019s bow, ensuring the highpoints are balanced. .-Define the center of the bottom lip in parallel with the bow of the lip. .-Outline the corners of the lips, then trace along the natural lip line to connect all lines. .-Sharpen as needed for clean and precise lines. .-Pro Tip: To create volume and give the illusion of fuller lips, start tracing your lips from your outer corners to the center of your lips.

reviews.review_title: A Reliable Pick for Long-Lasting Definition
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've always been searching for a lip liner that combines intense pigmentation with staying power, and the Make Up For Ever Artist Color Pencil Extreme Waterproof Lip Liner in Caffeine certainly delivers on both fronts.  Firstly, the pigmentation is outstanding. With just one swipe, the color payoff is rich and bold, allowing for precise definition without needing multiple passes. This makes it effortless to outline and fill in the lips, whether I'm opting for a natural look or something more dramatic.  What sets this liner apart is its waterproof and transfer-proof formula. Once applied, it truly stays put throughout the day. I've tested it through meals and drinks, and I'm impressed by how well it resists fading or feathering. This reliability makes it a go-to choice for long days when I need my lip color to stay intact.  The texture is another standout feature. Despite being waterproof, the liner has a surprisingly creamy consistency that glides on smoothly without tugging at the lips. It feels comfortable and lightweight, almost like a second skin, which is crucial for all-day wear.  The shade Caffeine, a nude with a velvet matte finish, is versatile and complements a wide range of lipsticks and glosses. I often wear it alone for a natural look or as a base to enhance the longevity of my lip color. The matte finish adds a touch of sophistication without feeling overly drying.  The Make Up For Ever Artist Color Pencil Extreme Waterproof Lip Liner in Caffeine has become a staple in my makeup routine. Its exceptional pigmentation, waterproof formula, and comfortable wear make it a must-have for anyone looking for a reliable lip liner that won't disappoint.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: okay, so i've been trying out the artist color pencil extreme waterproof lip liner, and let me just say, it's pretty amazing. first off, the color payoff is insane. like, one swipe and right away! you've got this intense, pigmented color that really pops. i got it in shade anywhere caffeine (the most iconic ofc), and it's perfect for that everyday look. now, onto the important stuff u2014 it claims to be waterproof and transfer-proof, and i have to say, it holds up. i tested it through snacks, drinks, the works, and it stayed put. no smudges, no feathering, just solid color all day long. i'm impressed. the texture is super creamy, which makes application a breeze. it just glides on smoothly without tugging at your lips, and the finish is a velvet matte that's not drying at all. it feels comfortable, like you're not even wearing anything on your lips. applying it is easy peasy too. the pencil tip is precise enough to outline your lips perfectly, and it sharpens nicely for those clean lines. i followed the tips they gave u2014 tracing the cupidu2019s bow, defining the bottom lip center, and outlining everything u2014 and it really does help in getting that defined look. overall, i'm really liking this lip liner. it's become my go-to for when i want my lips to stand out without having to touch up every hour. if you're into makeup that lasts and looks great, definitely give this one a shot!!!
